name: Rexall Health
description: Rexall Health is a leading Canadian pharmacy chain that has been serving communities for over 100 years. Founded in 1904, Rexall aims to provide accessible healthcare solutions and quality products to its customers. With a commitment to health and wellness, Rexall offers a wide range of services, including prescription medications, over-the-counter drugs, health consultations, and immunization services. The company operates more than 400 locations across Canada, each designed to deliver personalized care and support to patients. Rexall is dedicated to enhancing the health of Canadians by partnering with healthcare professionals and utilizing technology to improve patient outcomes. In addition to pharmacy services, Rexall also features a comprehensive selection of beauty and personal care products, vitamins, and health supplements, ensuring that customers can find everything they need under one roof. The brand is known for its customer-first philosophy, which emphasizes convenience, accessibility, and quality service. Rexall also invests in community health initiatives and promotes various health awareness campaigns, demonstrating its commitment to the well-being of Canadians. As the pharmacy landscape evolves, Rexall continues to innovate and adapt, integrating digital solutions to enhance customer experience while maintaining a focus on compassionate care and community engagement.

seo.meta_description: Explore Rexall Health, a leading Canadian pharmacy chain dedicated to providing quality healthcare solutions and wellness products. Discover our services and commitment to community health.

faq.question: What services does Rexall offer?
faq.answer: Rexall offers prescription medications, over-the-counter drugs, immunization services, and health consultations.

faq.question: Where is Rexall located?
faq.answer: Rexall has over 400 locations across Canada.

faq.question: What types of products can I find at Rexall?
faq.answer: Rexall features a wide range of health and wellness products, including vitamins, health supplements, and beauty products.

faq.question: How long has Rexall been in business?
faq.answer: Rexall has been in business for over 100 years, since its founding in 1904.
